data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Porto.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Throw-in Boavista.
In the minute 4, Sergio Oliveira for Porto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Boavista have a goal kick.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Boavista throw-in in Porto's half.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Porto.
Gustavo Sauer (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Porto to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Alex Telles of Porto gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Boavista's Paulinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Porto defender.
In the minute 12, Mateus Uribe hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Porto!
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Boavista a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
In the minute 15, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Boavista.
In the minute 17, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Boavista's Paulinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Boavista.
Boavista drive upfield and Angel Gomes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Porto defender.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Ricardo Mangas of Boavista is pulled up for offside.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 25, Porto are coming forward and Sergio Oliveira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Boavista have a goal kick.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 28, Alex Telles (Porto) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 29, Free kick for Porto in the half of Boavista.
Nuno Valente Santos for Boavista has been booked by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho and receives a first yellow card.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Porto in the half of Boavista.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Porto to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 35, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Boavista a goal kick.
Free kick Boavista.
Porto's Jesus Corona has run offside.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 40, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Moussa Marega (Porto) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Porto in the half of Boavista.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Porto are pushing forward but Sergio Oliveira's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Porto.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Porto take a 0-1 lead thanks to Jesus Corona.
In the minute 47, Otavio instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 49, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Boavista just outside Porto's area.
Boavista pushes forward through Gustavo Sauer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Boavista in Porto.
In the minute 52, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Porto.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 56, Porto have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Throw-in Boavista.
In the minute 57, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto.
Luis Diaz is replacing Mateus Uribe for Porto at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Sergio Oliveira puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
The home team replace Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez with Alberth Elis.
In the minute 60, Alberth Elis for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick Boavista.
Jesus Corona gets his shot on target but fails to score for Porto.
In the minute 62, Paulinho for Boavista drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Porto.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 66, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Goal! Moussa Marega extends Porto's lead to 0-3.
Great play from Sergio Oliveira to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In the minute 70, Otavio (Porto) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 71, It's now 0-4 in Porto as Moussa Marega scores for Porto.
Jesus Corona with an assist there.
Vasco Seabra (Boavista) is making a second substitution, with Show replacing Gustavo Sauer.
In the minute 74, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Boavista's half.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 77, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Boavista drive upfield and Nuno Valente Santos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Porto defender.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
In the minute 78, Sergio Conceicao is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Mehdi Taremi replacing Otavio.
The away team have replaced Alex Telles with Zaidu Sanusi. This is the third substitution made today by Sergio Conceicao.
Free kick Boavista.
In the minute 79, Paulinho (Boavista) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 82, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 84, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Porto a goal kick.
Throw-in Boavista.
The home team have replaced Nuno Valente Santos with Miguel Reisinho. This is the third substitution made today by Vasco Seabra.
In the minute 86, Boavista make their fourth substitution with Nathan replacing Jesus Gomez.
Fabio Vieira is on a sub for Jesus Corona for Porto.
Romario Baro is replacing Sergio Oliveira for Porto at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 87, Moussa Marega of Porto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Boavista in the half of Porto.
Boavista's Angel Gomes misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
In Porto Boavista's Alberth Elis is caught offside.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Porto.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Porto. The final score is 0-5.
Goal! Porto extend their lead to 0-5 through Luis Diaz.
That's a fine assist from Wilson Manafa.
